Name: Warehouse and Logistics Simulator
About the game: Are you ready for your new challenge? Get ready to take over the control of your original 'Jungheinrich' Forklift! Just the best drivers will level up in the Highscore list. The fastest drivers will receive a special bonus. Enjoy the game in full 3D and feel the realistic driving experience. Varied scenarios like the warehouse, construction zone or port zone guarantee variety. Features Original 'Jungheinrich' Forklifts Huge variety of quests Different game modes Realistic physics Different detailed 3D Scenarios like supermarket, port or construction zone
